# Docusaurus Blog Application - Copilot Instructions

This is a Docusaurus-based blogging service application.

## Project Overview

- **Type**: Docusaurus Blog Application
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Framework**: Docusaurus v3 (Classic Template)
- **Purpose**: A fully-featured blogging platform with documentation capabilities

## Setup Status

- [x] Project scaffolded using Docusaurus classic template
- [x] TypeScript configured
- [x] Dependencies installed
- [x] Documentation files created

## Development Commands

- `npm start` - Start the development server at http://localhost:3000
- `npm run build` - Build the website for production
- `npm run serve` - Serve the built website locally
- `npm run deploy` - Deploy to GitHub Pages
- `npm run clear` - Clear the build cache
- `npm run swizzle` - Customize Docusaurus components

## Project Structure

```
blog-app/
├── blog/                 # Blog posts directory
├── docs/                 # Documentation pages
├── src/
│   ├── components/      # Custom React components
│   ├── css/             # Global styles
│   └── pages/           # Custom pages
├── static/              # Static files
├── docusaurus.config.ts # Main configuration file
├── sidebars.ts          # Documentation sidebar configuration
└── package.json         # Dependencies and scripts
```

## Key Features

- Blog functionality with date-based organization
- Documentation with versioning support
- Customizable navigation and sidebar
- Dark/Light mode support
- Full-text search
- Mobile responsive design
- SEO optimized

## Next Steps

1. Start the development server: `npm start`
2. Add your first blog post in the `blog/` directory
3. Customize documentation in the `docs/` directory
4. Edit `docusaurus.config.ts` for site configuration
5. Deploy to GitHub Pages when ready
